dc_title_s: Mapa de los estados unidos de Méjico ségun lo organizado y definido por las varias actas del Congreso de dicha República y construido por las mejores autoridades.
dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. Area covered includes the southwestern part of the present United States. Prime meridian: Wahington. Insets: Tabla de distaucias -- Tabla estadistica -- Carta de los caminos &c. desde Vera Cruz y Alvorado a Méjico -- Profile of the route between Mexico and Vera Cruz - Profile of the route btween [sic] Mexico and Acapulco -- Map showing the battle grounds of the 8th and 9th May 1846 -- Chart of the bay of Vera Cruz -- Tampico and its environs -- Plan of Monterey and its environs -- Map of the Battleground Feb. 22 and 23, 1847. Statistical table attached to inside front cover. 1 map: hand col., mounted on cloth; 74 x 104 cm, folded in cover 27 x 20 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
